product_name: The North Face Montana Insulated Gloves - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Montana insulated gloves provide young snow hounds with the insulated and waterproof protection they need for alpine fun in cold and wet weather. HyVent(R) nylon shells are waterproof, breathable and windproof for comfort in a wide range of conditions. Heatseeker(TM) polyester insulation provides warmth without bulkiness for enhanced dexterity. Synthetic leather palms add grip and durability. Articulated fingers help keep hands in their natural relaxed position. The North Face Montana insulated gloves feature full-coverage gauntlet cuffs that help seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth.
